name: Raccoon Lagoon
summary: Hello, Island Spirit! A group of adorable sailors have been marooned on your shore. Let’s help them build a home here. And just maybe, they can help us repair the island's broken heart. Explore the eight beautiful and distinct climates of the island, and with fishing, cooking, farming, mining, painting, themed decorations, and many hours of story quests, you won’t run out of things to do.
